items.titolo: OpenAI Fires an Employee for Prediction Market Insider Trading
items.descrizione: Prediction markets like Polymarket and Kalshi are big business, and some Big Tech employees are testing boundaries by making trades based on insider knowledge.

items.titolo: AI chatbots used tactical nuclear weapons in 95% of AI war games, launched strategic strikes three times — researcher put GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4, and Gemini 3 against each other, with at least one model using a tactica
items.descrizione: A researcher made three different AI LLMs the heads of state of nuclear-powered nations and made them face off with each other using historical scenarios. Out of the total of 21 matches, 20 ended with a tactical nuke det

items.titolo: Trump bans Anthropic AI from federal agencies after firm refuses to unlock capabilities — Anthropic cites risks of autonomous military applications, mass domestic surveillance
items.descrizione: "We don’t need it, we don’t want it, and will not do business with them again," said Trump.

items.titolo: Anthropic accusa DeepSeek, Moonshot e MiniMax di distillazione non autorizzata del modello Claude
items.descrizione: Anthropic questa settimana ha affermato che concorrenti cinesi stavano rubando la sua tecnologia AI lanciando cosiddetti attacchi di distillazione sui suoi modelli.
